testcase.name: TC_07_Verify_There_Is_Cancel_Option_On_The_Page
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to "https://www.medunna.com/" page......................passed When user click on user icon option.........................................passed And user click on sign in option............................................passed When user enter valid username..............................................passed And user enter valid password...............................................passed And user click on remember me button........................................passed Then verify there is cancel button on the login page........................passed And user click on the cancel button.........................................passed Then verify user is taken to home page......................................passed Then close the application..................................................passed
